title: Award the Contracts of Building Constructions in the Universities of Peradeniya, Kelaniya, Wayamba and Moratuwa
decision_details:
- the proposal made by Hon. S.B. Dissanayake, Minister of Higher Education, to implement the following construction projects pertaining to the above Universities, was approved by the Cabinet:
 *	University of Peradeniya

(i)	construction of five storied building complex for the Faculty of Dental Sciences.
*	University of  Kelaniya

(i)	construction of a building for the Information and Communication Technology Centre.
*	Wayamba University of Sri Lanka – Kuliyapitiya

(i)	construction of the building for the Faculty of Applied Sciences.
*	University of Moratuwa

(i)	construction of Lecture Hall Building for the Faculty of Architecture.

(ii)	construction of multipurpose building for the Faculty of Engineering.
